name: AstroRush (itch) (Eeshaan)
description:
Game Description 📜

A chaotic spree of asteroids is headed the Earth's way, destroy them using missiles and protect the Earth !

Game Inputs 🎮

left mouse click to select the asteroid 

space bar to shoot missiles and destroy the asteroids

Creator Insight 👦🏻

Hello everyone, i'm Eeshaan. i'm from India and i'm quite new to game development and this is my first complete game. I have taken part is previous game jams but failed to complete anything worth calling a game. Thats what makes this game really special to me, hope everyone playing enjoys it.

(do comment below and tell me your thoughts on the game 😄)
